<h3 id="X38099">X(38099) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(8), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4-12*(b+c)*a^3+(7*b^2+22*b*c+7*c^2)*a^2+4*(b+c)*(3*b^2-8*b*c+3*c^2)*a-11*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38099) = 4*X(2)-X(1317) = X(2)+2*X(3036) = 5*X(2)+X(12531) = 4*X(10)-X(6174) = 10*X(10)-X(10609) = X(11)+2*X(3679) = 11*X(11)-2*X(12653) = X(1317)+8*X(3036) = 5*X(1317)+4*X(12531) = 10*X(3036)-X(12531) = 11*X(3679)+X(12653) = 5*X(6174)-2*X(10609) = 2*X(32557)-5*X(34122) = 6*X(32557)-5*X(38026) = 3*X(32557)-5*X(38104) = X(32557)+5*X(38213) = 3*X(34122)-X(38026) = 3*X(34122)-2*X(38104) = X(34122)+2*X(38213) = 2*X(38128)+X(38156) = X(38128)+2*X(38177) = X(38156)-4*X(38177)</b>
<p>X(38099) lies on these lines: {2,1317}, {10,6174}, {11,3679}, {30,38128}, {80,31508}, {517,38077}, {518,38095}, {519,32557}, {524,38192}, {527,38202}, {528,38057}, {529,38215}, {952,3653}, {1145,4745}, {1387,4677}, {2801,4731}, {2802,3921}, {2829,38074}, {3241,6667}, {3617,10707}, {3634,11274}, {3828,15863}, {4669,6702}, {5840,38066}, {5844,38084}, {5846,38090}, {5848,38087}, {5851,38092}, {5853,38102}, {5855,38106}, {5856,38097}, {6735,38060}, {6931,34710}, {7972,19876}, {9780,10031}, {10087,16857}, {10956,38093}, {21154,28204}, {25416,34641}, {31145,31272}, {37438,37725}</p>
<p>
X(38099) = reflection of X(38026) in X(38104)<br>
X(38099) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (19875, 38081, 38100), (34122, 38026, 38104), (38128, 38177, 38156)<br>
</p>
